text: was a Japanese photographer famous for landscape photographs and movies. He published 46 photography books in Japan, and founded the Tankei Photo Agency Co. The Shinzo Maeda Photo Art Gallery in Biei, Hokkaidō, opened in 1987, and exhibits a number of his Hokkaidō photographs. One of his movies, Tower on the Hill of Japan's Biei region, is often shown in HDTV format. ==External links== *Chronological list of publications by Maeda, and a few pictures Category:Japanese photographers Category:1922 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Landscape photographers
title: Shinzo Maeda
